Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Marriott London Maida Vale in London (Maida Vale), you'll be convenient to The Tricycle Theatre and London Zoo. This 4-star hotel is close to Selfridges and Royal Albert Hall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 223 air-conditioned rooms featuring microwaves and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services. Additional amenities include babysitting/childcare (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and a hair salon. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and limo/town car service. This hotel has 6 meeting rooms available for events. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Marriott London Maida Vale in London (Maida Vale), you'll be convenient to The Tricycle Theatre and London Zoo. This 4-star hotel is close to Selfridges and Royal Albert Hall.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The Tricycle Theatre - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Hampstead Theatre - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Lord's Cricket Ground - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Swiss Cottage Farmers' Market - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Freud Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Primrose Hill - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
London Business School - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Regent's Park - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Whiteleys Shopping Centre - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
London Zoo - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Portobello Road Market - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Electric Cinema - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Everyman Cinemas - Hampstead - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Queen Mary's Gardens - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Keats House - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 17 km / 10.6 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 19.3 km / 12 mi

The preferred airport for Marriott London Maida Vale is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Essential Information:
Please note: For Dynamic bookings only: Please note that if the rate is inclusive of breakfast, this will only be provided for maximum number of 2 guests regardless of how many guests are confirmed for the room. Additional guests will have to pay for the breakfast charge directly to hotel. Extra Bed Policy: Additional charges may apply. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
